trigger.description: Low free disk space on {HOSTNAME} volume /
Low number of free inodes on {HOSTNAME} volume /
Processor load is too high on {HOSTNAME}
Incoming errors on interface eth0 was increased on {HOSTNAME}
Outgoing errors on interface eth0 was increased on {HOSTNAME}
Incoming drops on interface eth0 was increased on {HOSTNAME}
Outgoing drops on interface eth0 was increased on {HOSTNAME}
Low free disk space on {HOSTNAME} volume /boot

item.params: BUFFERS=`awk '$1 ~ /^Buffers:/ {print $2}' /proc/meminfo` CACHED=`awk '$1 ~ /^Cached:/ {print $2}' /proc/meminfo` FREE=`awk '$1 ~ /^MemFree:/ {print $2}' /proc/meminfo` let RESULT=$BUFFERS+$CACHED+$FREE echo $RESULT

item.key: ssh.run[Free number of inodes on / in %,,{$SSH_PORT},{$SSH_ENCODING}]
item.description: Free number of inodes on / in %
